system.description:
The strength of your convictions helps to temper some of the erraticness brought on by your supernatural blood. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your herald levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Dyscracia feature.
  • You also gain an additional benefit depending on which option you use:
    • If you use the Humeric Rebalance option from Dyscracia, you can also use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.my42mip0qc35rcp2]{Lay on Hands} on yourself as part of the same action.
    • If you use the Humeric Malediction option, you gain an expertise die on melee attacks against the target and on a hit, you deal an additional 1d4 points of radiant damage.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as herald levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ul62twmxrrc072yg]{Heraldic Sermon} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xezwxikwrsfkzg4o]{Sacred Aura} features.
  • While wielding a weapon enhanced with Power of the Mind, if you are bloodied and not in blood frenzy, all of your bloodblade levels count as herald levels for the purpose of determining the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} rather than the usual half.
